MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL32 postcode area of Conwy, affecting properties in Meirion Drive, Stephenson Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:58PM.Our engineers are on site and have managed to restore power to a number of properties, they are continuing to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect the power to be restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:30PM on 2nd November 2020
